mapper.select: SELECT a.mnrtName ,a.mnrtAddressFull ,a.mnrtFoodCate ,a.mnrtTime ,a.mnrtBreakTime ,a.mnrtHoliday ,a.mnrtText ,a.mnrtNumber ,a.mnrtAvg FROM matnam.matnamRestaurant a WHERE 1=1 AND a.mnrtSeq = ${mnrtSeq}
SELECT a.mnrvScore ,a.mnrvText ,b.mnMmName FROM matnam.matnamReview a left join matnam.matnamMember b ON b.mnMmSeq = a.mnMmSeq where 1=1 and mnrtSeq = ${mnrtSeq};
